lines.text: Read xx [ 0 ] , xx [ 1 ] , xx [ 2 ] and xx [ 3 ]
sort xx and xx + 4 in ascending order
set integers b , c , d to 0
if j is not equal to i , then set yy [ b + + ] = xx [ j ]
lines.code: if ( j != i ) { yy [ b ++ ] = xx [ j ] ; }

lines.text: if yy [ 0 ] + yy [ 1 ] is greater than yy [ 2 ] , then set c = 1
if yy [ 0 ] + yy [ 1 ] is equal to yy [ 2 ] , then set d = 1
if c is equal to 1 , then print TRIANGLE and a new line
if c is equal to 0 and d is equal to 1 , then print SEGMENT and a new line
lines.code: if ( c == 0 && d == 1 ) cout << " SEGMENT " << endl ;

lines.text: if c is equal to 0 and d is equal to 0 , then print IMPOSSIBLE and a new line
lines.code: if ( c == 0 && d == 0 ) cout << " IMPOSSIBLE " << endl ;
